channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Quand Google cesse d’envoyer des lecteurs aux sites web
item.description: Google a beau s’en défendre, le constat est sans appel : le moteur de recherche renvoie de moins en moins de trafic vers les sites web. En cause, notamment, ses résumés générés par intelligence artificielle, qui fournissent des réponses sans nécessiter le moindre clic. En coulisses, les éditeurs prennent acte de cette érosion et tentent, tant bien que mal, de préparer un avenir où Google ne sera plus un passage obligé....

item.title: The latest Legend of Zelda Lego set pays tribute to Ocarina of Time's final battle
item.description: We already knew something Ocarina of Time-related was coming from Nintendo and Lego in 2026, and now we know exactly what that set will look like. Weighing in at a surprisingly modest 1,003 pieces, the typically word salad-y Lego The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time - The Final Battle is the second Lego Zelda set, following the 2,500-piece Great Deku Tree set in 2024. While the latter lets you choose between building either a Breath of the Wild or OoT-themed replica of the wise old guardian of the forest, the upcoming set is aimed squarely at fans of the series’ debut 3D outing. As you can pro...

item.title: X has been down for most of the morning
item.description: X is still struggling with an outage that has intermittently taken the service offline and made it slow to load for much of the morning. According to X’s developer platform page, there is an ongoing incident related to streaming endpoints that’s caused increased errors. The incident started at 7:39AM PT, according to the page.That roughly coincides with a spike in reports at Down Detector. The issues seems to be somewhat intermittent. At some points, X’s website has loaded partially and only shown older posts. At other times, the app and website have failed to load at all. Developing…This art...

item.title: How a hacking campaign targeted high-profile Gmail and WhatsApp users across the Middle East
item.description: The phishing campaign targeted users on WhatsApp, including an Iranian-British activist, and stole the credentials of a Lebanese cabinet minister and at least one journalist.

item.title: X is still having issues following an hour-long outage on Friday
item.description: On Friday morning, X and Grok went offline for users around the world on both the websites and apps. Outage reports began spiking on DownDetector around 10:00AM ET, while Cisco's ThousandEyes outage map noted over 600 X servers around the world that were having problems. Attempts to load the site with either the Twitter.com or […]

item.title: TikTok sued by former workers over alleged union-busting
item.description: You know things are messed up when a Big Tech company fights accusations of union-busting by insisting it was only AI layoffs. That's where things stand after a group of fired TikTok moderators in the UK filed a legal claim with an employment tribunal. The Guardian reported on Friday that around 400 TikTok content moderators who were unionizing were laid off before Christmas.The workers were sacked a week before a vote was scheduled to establish a collective bargaining unit. The moderators said they wanted better protection against the personal toll of processing traumatic content at a high sp...

item.title: Samsung : quand les promotions des soldes cassent les prix des Galaxy S, Galaxy Book, Galaxy Watch
item.description: La deuxième démarque des soldes apporte son lot de nouvelles offres Samsung ! Et à l’approche du week-end, c’est le moment idéal pour saisir les meilleurs deals du géant sud-coréen. Entre TV QLED élégants, smartphones à clapet et écrans Ultra Wide OLED, il y en a pour tous les goûts — avec, en vedette, un vidéoprojecteur affichant plus de 60 % de remise ! ...

item.title: Let’s Talk About the Ending of ’28 Years Later: The Bone Temple’
item.description: Ralph Fiennes and Jack O'Connell star in the second of three '28 Years Later' sequels, now in theaters.

item.title: Soldes d’hiver 2026 : voici les meilleure offres pour ce week-end de 2e démarque
item.description: Les soldes d'hiver suivent leur chemin et nous arrivons au déjà au deuxième week-end ! Au programme : toujours plus d'offres Tech à prix cassés, que ce soient les smartphones, les tablettes, les téléviseurs 4K, et surtout les ordinateurs portables, gaming ou de bureautique. Même le gaming s'invite avec la PS5 en promo.

item.title: Quels sont les meilleurs ordinateurs portables grand format de 16, 17 et 18 pouces en 2026 ?
item.description: Les ordinateurs portables de 16 et 18 pouces offrent une expérience visuelle immersive et un espace de travail optimisé. Vous cherchez un modèle de grand laptop adapté ? Découvrez notre sélection des meilleurs PC portables grand format pour faire le bon choix.

item.title: La Pixel Watch pourrait sauver votre journée grâce à cette nouvelle alerte
item.description: Google travaillerait à une nouvelle fonction d'alerte sur ses montres Pixel Watch. Elle permettrait de prévenir l'utilisateur lorsqu'il s'éloigne trop de son smartphone et risque de l'oublier.

item.title: Man’s Switch to Keto Diet Triggers Bizarre, Rare Rash
item.description: Only around 300 cases of so-called "keto rash" have been documented worldwide.

item.title: Boulanger multiplie les réductions durant les soldes : les 16 deals à saisir ce weeke-end
item.description: À l’occasion du week-end de la deuxième démarque des soldes, Boulanger propose de belles offres pour se faire plaisir. L’enseigne affiche d’importantes réductions sur les smartphones haut de gamme, comme l’ancien flagship de Google ou le récent milieu de gamme de Xiaomi.

item.title: Test du REKT Shogun 68 : ce clavier est vendu comme un Wooting pas cher
item.description: Pourquoi payer 190 € quand on peut avoir le Rapid Trigger pour 99 € ? 8000 Hz, activation à 0,01 mm, switchs magnétiques Amber Pro... on a testé le REKT Hiro 60.

item.title: Audible deal: Three months of access is only $3 right now
item.description:
One way to read more in the new year is to incorporate audiobooks as part of your reading habit. Audible is having a sale right now that makes that easier and cheaper to do: you can get three months of access for only $1 per month, or a total of $3. The promotion runs through January 21. An Audible subscription grants one audiobook per month to keep. This can be selected from a massive catalog of new releases and bestsellers. The collection here has just about everything.
However, it's easy to plow through a single book in a month. Users also get streaming access to thousands of curated tit...

item.title: Canada is going to start importing Chinese EVs — will the US follow?
item.description: Is the North American blockade on Chinese EVs softening? Today, Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney announced a deal with China to slash tariffs on electric vehicles in exchange for lowering duties on canola products. Canada will initially allow up to 49,000 Chinese EVs at a 6.1 percent tariff, Carney said, though the exact timeline was […]

item.title: 600,000 Trump Mobile phones sold? There’s no proof.
item.description: Where's the Trump phone? We're going to keep talking about it every week. We've reached out, as usual, to ask about the Trump phone's whereabouts. As usual, we're still waiting for a response. In the meantime, some impressive alleged sales figures have gone viral - but they might be too good to be true. This […]

item.title: Are you ‘grounded’ or in a rut in your career? ‘Stable’ or stuck?
item.description: Here’s how to tell the difference—and what to do about it. For a long time, I told myself I was choosing stability.

item.title: Fnac Darty lance une grande braderie pour le week-end de la 2e démarque des soldes
item.description: Le week-end approche, et Fnac et Darty passent à la vitesse supérieure pour la deuxième démarque des soldes ! Les deux enseignes cassent encore les prix sur des produits déjà en promo : laptop à double écran à prix mini, Apple Watch en baisse, trottinette Xiaomi encore plus abordable… C’est le bon moment pour craquer avant la fin des stocks !

item.title: How to watch Getting Filthy Rich season 4 online – free stream, release date
item.description: Olivia Attwood: Getting Filthy Rich returns to our screens for its third series. Read here for how to watch Olivia Attwood: Getting Filthy Rich season 4 online and free from anywhere.

With a microphone in front of him and a giant sign reading TALK TO ME placed above, "Mike" waits, hands clasped patiently in front of his body, to take questions from his public. "Mike" is […]

item.title: The Richest 1% Blew Their 2026 Carbon Budget in 10 Days. Some Did It in 3
item.description: A new report underscores the vastly disproportionate role the super-rich play in driving the climate crisis.

item.title: Home Depot's weekend sale is like a Presidents' Day preview — 40% off appliances, tools, furniture and more
item.description: Home Depot's long weekend sale is like a Presidents' Day preview, and I'm rounding up the best deals, including 40% off appliances, tools, furniture, and more.

item.title: Google Gemini : quotas séparés pour Pro et Raisonnement, voici les limites détaillées
item.description: Google revoit totalement sa gestion des quotas pour Gemini. Fini le pot commun, place à des limites séparées pour le raisonnement et le code, avec un avantage massif pour les abonnés Ultra.

item.title: How Trump is breaking with precedent by naming a growing list of federal properties after himself
item.description: It’s extremely rare for government assets to be named after a sitting president. Most American presidents aspire to the kind of greatness that prompts future generations to name important things in their honor.Donald Trump isn’t leaving it to future generations.As the first year of his second term wraps up, his Republican administration and allies have put his name on the U.S. Institute of Peace, the Kennedy Center performing arts venue and a new class of battleships.That’s on top of the “Trump Accounts” for tax-deferred investments, the TrumpRx government website soon to offer direct sales of...

item.title: Kodak’s collectible Charmera is a terrible camera I somehow don’t hate
item.description: Like trading cards, Lego figures, and even the coveted Labubu, you don't know exactly what your Kodak Charmera camera is going to look like until you open the box. The anticipation and a $30 price tag helped the collectible camera sell out quickly and become nearly impossible to find over the holidays after its debut […]

item.title: X is down for the second time this week
item.description: Elon Musk's X, formerly Twitter, is down for the second time this week. Nearly 80,000 reports have spiked on Down Detector since around 10 a.m. ET Friday morning.

item.title: 7 high-converting print-on-demand products to add to your website
item.description: From t-shirts to wall art, these print-on-demand products deliver the highest conversion rates and profit margins for influencers and brands.

item.title: Amazon lance une myriade d’offres durant les soldes : les 18 meilleures offres
item.description: Pendant les soldes d’hiver, Amazon ne réserve pas ses bonnes affaires aux seuls membres Prime : chacun peut profiter d’une large sélection de remises. Pour le week-end de la deuxième démarque, le géant américain multiplie les offres et met en avant de nombreuses promotions à saisir sans attendre.

item.title: Frustrated with Verizon? These are the best deals for switching to AT&T and T-Mobile
item.description: Both T-Mobile and AT&T have tempting switching offers for new customers this week.

item.description: After watching the Resident Evil Requiem showcase, launch day can't come soon enough, as the reveals have left me antsy.

item.title: 'We're competitive – we want to win': Netflix co-CEO Ted Sarandos rejects rumors that Warner Bros. movies won't stay in theaters for 45 days if $82bn buyout is approved
item.description: Netflix's co-chief has clarified its stance on the theatre going experience amid its potential buyout of Warner Bros.

item.title: Cisco has finally patched a maximum-level security issue which was allegedly being targeted by Chinese hackers
item.description: A maximum-severity Cisco bug was being exploited by multiple Chinese actors, reports said, forcing the firm to act.

item.title: Taco Bell’s ‘Luxe Value’ deals offer 10 new items for $3 or less, starting today. Here’s what’s on the menu
item.description: Taco Bell Rewards members can now access the new menu, but all other customers will have to wait until next Thursday. Taco Bell is saying “new year, new offerings” with the launch of its “Luxe Value Menu.”

item.title: Why is everyone posting 2016? What to know about the nostalgic social media trend that’s dominating TikTok
item.description: How young and innocent we all were. By the time they get into their 20s, every generation seems to have nostalgia for one year from their teenage years.

item.title: Chinese EVs inch closer to the US as Canada slashes tariffs
item.description: The country is dropping its import tax from 100% to just 6.1%, with an initial annual cap of 49,000 cars.

item.title: Elon Musk’s X Suffers Widespread Outage
item.description: Here comes another influx of refugees to competing sites like Threads and Bluesky.

item.title: We asked Minnesota’s biggest companies about ICE. None of them responded
item.description: In a sign of how far we’ve come from the summer of 2020, well-known brands have stayed silent as escalating chaos unfolds in their backyard. The sonic backdrop of the Twin Cities in 2026 is a cacophony.

item.title: Lego’s Next ‘Legend of Zelda’ Set Takes Us Back to ‘Ocarina of Time’
item.description: Link and Zelda face off against Ganon in Lego's recreation of the iconic N64 game's climactic boss battle.

item.description: The plan, which is still in its early stages, is spearheaded by former USDS administrator Mikey Dickerson.

item.title: What’s on the cards for Arc Raiders in 2026? According to the game’s design lead there’s going to be a roadmap shared soon as well as multiple new maps throughout the year
item.description: Arc Raiders design lead Virgil Watkins has teased some of what's in store for 2026. The game will be getting multiple maps this year.

item.title: Apple n’est plus prioritaire sur les puces de ses iPhone, la faute à Nvidia
item.description: TSMC a retiré le tapis rouge sous les pieds d'Apple. La firme à la pomme doit faire de la place à d'autres clients du fondeur, en particulier Nvidia. Un changement considérable dans la relation entre Apple et TSMC.

item.title: Forget the RAM crisis – are we headed for a full-blown GPU crisis? Rumored production cut for Nvidia GPUs makes it seem more likely
item.description: Nvidia won't have any new GPUs for 2026, rumor claims – and with an up to 20% drop in production, this year could be a troubled one.

item.title: YouTube relaxes monetization guidelines for some controversial topics
item.description: These controversial topics include self-harm, abortion, suicide, and domestic and sexual abuse.

item.title: Samsung will pay you $50 to leave your non-Samsung watch party
item.description: Samsung is giving $50 Venmo rideshare credits to 900 fans who "transfer" to a watch party with a Samsung TV. Plus, save up to 50% on new TVs.

item.title: Bluesky rolls out cashtags and LIVE badges amid a boost in app installs
item.description: Bluesky adds new features to its app amid a boost in installs due to the deepfake drama on X.

item.title: Yes, you can still buy the DJI Neo 2 Drone — and right now, get it on sale
item.description: As of Jan. 16, get the DJI Neo 2 drone at Amazon for $599. That's the drone's lowest price ever so you can capture 4K content from the sky.

item.title: How Jerome Powell could stay at the Federal Reserve until 2028
item.description: His term as chair of the central bank ends on May 15, 2026. The Justice Department’s investigation into Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell has brought heightened attention to a key drama that will play out at the central bank in the coming months: Will Powell leave the Fed when his term as chair ends, or will he take the unusual step of remaining a governor?Powell’s term as Fed chair finishes on May 15, but because of the central bank’s complex structure, he has a separate term as one of seven members of its governing board that lasts until January 31, 2028. Historically, nearly all Fed chair...

item.title: How to claim Verizon's $20 credit for Wednesday's service outage
item.description: Verizon is offering a very small mea culpa after Wednesday's massive outage, which drew more than 1.5 million reports on Downdetector and lasted hours. Initially, the carrier posted on X that it will offer a $20 credit, but customers must redeem it in the myVerizon app. The company then said the credit could be claimed though customer service (via phone or chat), but our editors’ attempts to do so via chat were met with a message to wait for a text with further instructions. Engadget editors began receiving the texts this morning (Jan 16) with a link to redeem. From there, you need to log into...

item.title: X (Twitter) a encore été en panne : c’est la deuxième fois en une semaine
item.description: X (Twitter) a traversé une nouvelle panne. C'est déjà la deuxième fois cette semaine.

item.title: Big screen, bigger deal: Save over $900 on the LG 86-inch 85A QNED Mini-LED TV
item.description: The LG 86-inch 85A QNED Mini-LED 4K TV is on sale for only $1,396.99 at Amazon, which is over $900 off and its best price ever.
